components/products/custom-wall-decal-in:
Send in your own artwork to receive a free quote/proof!

  • Price will be based on Square inches
  • Artwork: Must be one of the following:
    • Vectored graphics from Adobe illustrator or Corel Draw
    • Over 300dpi Resolution images
  • Minimum Charge of $15.00
  • Can be hand placed
  • Great for Banks, Gyms, Offices, Coffeeshops, Schools, Classrooms and more
  • Easily removable from all painted surfaces
  • Great for promotional events
  • Matte finish
